metadata.title: CVE-2019-14369 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Exiv2::PngImage::readMetadata() in pngimage.cpp in Exiv2 0.27.99.0 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via acrafted image file.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
